name: multiplayer-sharded-game
description: Cost-optimized sharded multiplayer game backend with Appwrite integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:manager && npm run install:shard && npm run install:client
scripts.demo: npm run demo:setup && concurrently "npm run demo:manager" "npm run demo:shard1" "npm run demo:shard2"
scripts.demo:manager: cd shard-manager && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.demo:shard1: cd game-shard && SHARD_ID=shard-1 PORT=4001 MANAGER_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run dev
scripts.demo:shard2: cd game-shard && SHARD_ID=shard-2 PORT=4002 MANAGER_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run test:manager && npm run test:shard
